extendedInfo.description: Crazy Home Screen Replacement App!- 3 separate desktops, each with its own theme- Easily switch desktops by swiping up/down- Up to 5 screens each desktop- Supports Crazy Home, ADW, aHome, and 3rd party Open Home themes- Full icon customization using the icon configurator- Hide apps from your app drawer- Change app titles- Supports Live Wallpapers- Analog Crazy Clock- Crazy Clock skins- App dock- Hide/Unhide top notification bar- Backup/Restore settingsEMAIL me with issues! - I would love it if bad comments magically fixed apps, but unfortunately, they don't.  You wouldn't go to the doctor's and say "This body sucks, 1 star!" and expect him to diagnosis you would you?Check out crazydudeproductions.com if you'd like to create your own themes, icon packs, or crazy clock packs.  New Theme, Icon Pack, Clock Pack Templates and Tutorials are available at the website.

reviews.title: This home is awesome
reviews.comment: I love this app and it seems like this is better than the paid version, no problems at all, recomend to everyone and anyone, great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing!!!
reviews.comment: Best home costomizer ever found so far! Running very fast on this old HTC legend. Keep it up!!
reviews.author: Saxon Hansen

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.comment: For the love of god, please fix this bug that keeps making the app crash. I\'m gonna uninstall till its fixed cze this is ridiculous
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t always work. The theme holds until the screen goes black then reverts back to original phone theme.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Freezing often, force closes, not allowing use of specialized theme icons & sometimes denying access to place an icon. HTC EVO
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keep having to force close always freezing..and its not holding my themes which I have paid for..grrr uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to love it
reviews.comment: I have been using for couple years now..got the galaxy s 3 was using the app then their was a software update and now can\'t use it.....I want my crazy home/crazy pastels back!! I have reported it 20 plus times and no response back
reviews.author: Laurie Harrison

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great widget I love all the home screens you need a boondock saints free theme please
reviews.author: Dalton Elliott

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: Definitely give this a try, and don\'t forget to get the add on  icon packs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A great speedy launcher.
reviews.comment: I have tried out just about every launcher out there, launcher7, go launcher, go launcher ex, launcher pro, adw launcher, and even helauncher2 just to name a few, and this is by far the quickest launcher with the coolest theme and fastest speed. It took seconds to download, and I think this will be the launcher to stay. Great job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Amazing n its jst crazy....i really luv this laincher
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: By far...the best! Totally in a league of its own. Raises the bar completely for all other developers. Kudos!!!! HTC ReZound 4G LTE
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I think it is the best looking home launcher i have downloaded but i needs some adjustments and the status bar needs to not go away. It has potential
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stylish
reviews.comment: Stylish classy It\'s 1 of the best that I\'ve seen today You need more like this 1 old guy is cool .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waiting...
reviews.comment: There is no way to lock in memory so it redraws every time I return to home. Good concept though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best theme i ever had i love love love it the only problem is it lags my phone a little bit other then that perfect droid 2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice......bt has a bug..
reviews.comment: i cant change the walloaper whenever i apply a wallpaper the default wallpaper appears again....plz fix.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice, easier than most home replacements!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is awesome because the possibilities are endless. And for the galaxy s users out there, there is no widget. Just hit your home key twice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Couldn\'t even open
reviews.comment: Force closed since I\'ve downloaded it.. I loved using crazy home pls fix!!
